title: Wizards' All-Star Bradley Beal
description:
Washington Wizards All-Star guard Bradley Beal joins The Woj Pod to discuss the franchise's ascent, his looming free agency, NBA loyalty, opponent's recruiting him, his trust with ownership and front office, his talk to his AAU team going viral and much more. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
